resources.string: Ember steps into the tavern, an ethereal presence radiating a connection with nature, leaves and blossoms trailing behind them, a serene calmness in their gaze. \n\n"I\'ll have a drink that embodies the essence of nature, something that whispers of forest foliage and the gentle caress of a breeze."

string-array.name: player_ember
string-array.item: Thank you. A bit of tranquility after a day of enchanting chaos would be most welcome.
Perhaps, but I doubt even a sneaky drink could escape me tonight.
Your company might just add to the enchantment of the evening, wouldn\'t it?
